sentence: In early trading on Wednesday, shares of Home Depot topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 1.6%.
Year to date, Home Depot registers a 14.1% gain.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is JPMorgan Chase, trading down 0.6%.
JPMorgan Chase is showing a gain of 7.0% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are Apple, trading down 0.2%, and Chevron, trading up 1.3% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
